tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sustainable_development_goals (
 goal_id INT,
 goal_name TEXT,
 target TEXT,
 indicator TEXT,
 progress FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    age INT
);

CREATE TABLE visualization_data (
    visualization_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_data(user_id),
    goal_id INT REFERENCES progress_data(id),
    visualization_type VARCHAR(50),
    visualization_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE LocationData (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL(8,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6)
);

CREATE TABLE ARVisualization (
    visualization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    visualization_type ENUM('3D', '2D'),
    created_on TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_id INT NOT NULL,
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    record_date DATE NOT NULL,
    record_value INT NOT NULL
);
